search_results.snippet: Lyndon Harris is an inspirational speaker, forgiveness coach, and workshop leader who came kicking and screaming to the work of forgiveness.

search_results.title: Lyndon Harris
search_results.snippet: Lyndon Harris is the Co-director of Tigg's Pond Retreat Center in Zirconia, NC, where he is developing a Journey to Forgiveness Institute.
